body_html: We recently had lots of enhancements for layout optimizer. This issue should have been fixed: I have run train_image_classifier.py for resnet with the latest version of TensorFlow on my machine, layout optimizer makes the training 23.8% faster: 0.25 steps/sec or 4 steps/sec with layout optimizer, 0.31 steps/sec or 3.23 steps/sec without layout optimizer. 4/3.23-1 = 23.8% faster.

body: We recently had lots of enhancements for layout optimizer. This issue should have been fixed: I have run train_image_classifier.py for resnet with the latest version of TensorFlow on my machine, layout optimizer makes the training 23.8% faster: 0.25 steps/sec or 4 steps/sec with layout optimizer, 0.31 steps/sec or  3.23 steps/sec without layout optimizer. 4/3.23-1 = 23.8% faster.
